subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Vikings parted ways with Chris Kluwe, who has been outspoken on same-sex marriage rights, after taking another punter, Jeff Locke, in the N.F.L. draft.
snippet: The Vikings parted ways with Chris Kluwe, who has been outspoken on same-sex marriage rights, after taking another punter, Jeff Locke, in the N.F.L. draft.
